explanation: [0-0] A remote-controlled nitro truck with red wheels is parked at the starting line of a muddy track, ready to race. A little boy is sitting in a stroller watching the race. Three women are chatting around the boy, with a black car, a building, and some greenery behind them.

[0-2] The camera then pans left to a green remote-controlled nitro truck also parked at the starting line, ready to race. Behind it stand two men watching the race, one wearing a blue T-shirt and the other a black T-shirt.

[0-2] The camera then pans left to a green remote-controlled nitro truck also parked at the starting line, ready to race. Behind it stand two men watching the race, one wearing a blue T-shirt and the other a black T-shirt.

[2-6] Then the engine of the green truck starts to smoke as it warms up, preparing for the race. Immediately afterward, the green truck races past the starting line and starts speeding from left to right on the muddy track. At the same time, the red-wheeled truck also rushes out of the starting line and speeds on the track. Both cars kick up mud and engage in a fierce competition. Colorful flags are hanging beside the track, and many spectators are watching.

At the same time, the red-wheeled truck also rushes out of the starting line and speeds on the track. Both cars kick up mud and engage in a fierce competition. [6-9] Finally, the camera pans right, the green truck is the first to rush out of the finish line, maintaining the lead, and stops on the lawn, followed closely by the red-wheeled truck, which also rushes out of the finish line and stops on the lawn. There are five or six people watching the race on the lawn, and on the right side of the screen, a man in a blue jacket is holding a green flag and looking to the left. Several cars are also parked in front of the lawn.
